text:
Erias Ventures | Maryland | Software, System, Data Scientists, Data Engineers | Fulltime | Fully Cleared

Doing cleared work and want to work for a team that reads Hacker News like you?

Erias Ventures is a startup focused on providing engineering solutions in support of the national defense mission. We provide industry leading compensation and benefits and are looking for entrepreneurial minded folks to join our team.

For more info email jobs@eriasventures.com
